metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3804 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The MediaTek power management driver in Android before 2016-07-05 onAndroid One devices allows attackers to gain privileges via a craftedapplication, aka Android internal bug 28332766 and MediaTek internal bugALPS02694410.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
